allow:
Bash(echo "=== Demonstrating Complete NE25 Pipeline (Segfault-Free) ===
Database → Python → JSON → Quarto → HTML

Step 1: Generate JSON Dictionary (Python accesses DuckDB)")

Bash("C:/Program Files/R/R-4.4.3/bin/Rscript.exe" -e "
# Test R arrow package after session restart
cat(''Testing R arrow package...\n'')

# Test basic functionality first
library(arrow)
cat(''Arrow library loaded successfully\n'')

# Create simple test data
test_data <- data.frame(
  x = 1:5,
  y = letters[1:5],
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

cat(''Test data created\n'')

# Try to write parquet
temp_file <- tempfile(fileext = ''.parquet'')
cat(''Attempting to write parquet file...\n'')

arrow::write_parquet(test_data, temp_file)
cat(''SUCCESS: Parquet file written!\n'')

# Verify file exists
if (file.exists(temp_file)) {
  cat(''File exists, size:'', file.info(temp_file)$size, ''bytes\n'')
} else {
  cat(''ERROR: File was not created\n'')
}
")
